long.ar,cs,da,de,es,fi,fil,id,it,ms,nl,no,pt_:
Blocking trackers, ads and protecting your privacy.
Privacy Bear is the easiest way to protect your privacy without complicated settings.

âœ…Blocks Ads from thousands of sources, but does not block all ads to avoid being detected as an ad blocker.
âœ… Emails - blocking email trackers, ensuring that your emails are not used to drive commercial offers.
âœ… Social & Analytics Privacy - We block the analytics and major social trackers.
âœ… Easy & light - Nothing to configure, easy to use and our code is as light as possible to not consume your precious memory.

 ğŸ›ƒ Why does Privacy Bear need to read and change all my data on the websites I visitâ“
When you install Privacy Bear, your browser warns that Privacy Bear can â€œread and change all your data on the websites you visitâ€.

Privacy Bear requires these permissions to do its job of blocking trackers on all websites you visit. For more information, see our Privacy Bear Privacy Policy : https://privacy-bear.net/policy.html

â­ About
We are a non profit organization dedicated to protect the privacy of every user of the web and emails.
